column5: “PJ & Kay go the extra mile to make you feel like you're at a boutique hotel at a quarter of the cost.” (Christin, Feb 2017) A plush queen bed, fresh ground morning coffee, off street parking, personal refrigerator, and free WiFi provide a quiet, private retreat. Spacious library/dining with TV/Netflix set aside for guests. Kitchen, laundry room, & garden use included. Price is for one bedroom & private bath. For additional bedrooms, please book through Two Bedrooms in a Gracious Home.
